queries.query: SELECT userID FROM users WHERE userName = :user AND userPass = PASSWORD(:pass)
SELECT u.userID, u.userName FROM users u LEFT JOIN usernetwork n ON u.userID = n.userID WHERE n.networkID = :n
SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM usernetwork WHERE userID = :user
DELETE FROM usernetwork WHERE userID = :user AND networkID = :network
DELETE FROM users WHERE userID = :id LIMIT 1
SELECT userID FROM users WHERE userName = :name
SELECT userID FROM users WHERE MD5(userName) = :name
